snippet: A new book, "La Roja" by the author Jimmy Burns, takes a look at the history of soccer in Spain, from its beginnings up through the tumultous years of the rule of Francisco Franco to its conquering of Europe and the world.
abstract: A new book, "La Roja" by the author Jimmy Burns, takes a look at the history of soccer in Spain, from its beginnings up through the tumultous years of the rule of Francisco Franco to its conquering of Europe and the world.

headline.main: Euro 2012: La Roja the Team Meets 'La Roja,' the Book
